testcase.classname: As a registered user (student/parent), I want to have access to the login page from the homepage
testcase.name: The Login button should be visible in the top bar of the homepage,
testcase.system-out: Given The user goes to the "url" address....................................passed Then The user verifies that, the Login button is visible on the homepage....passed When The user clicks on the Login button....................................passed Then The user verifies that Login button redirects to the userlogin page....passed
